snippet: Charles Haley was frequently described as talented but troubled, with instances of bizarre behavior well established. On the field, however, Haley was a Hall of Famer.
abstract: Charles Haley was frequently described as talented but troubled, with instances of bizarre behavior well established. On the field, however, Haley was a Hall of Famer.

headline.main: A Vote for Charles Haley; Pick Your Hall of Famers
